segments.text: So Jen , what did you think of William ? Did you guys have a nice time on your first date ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yeah , it was great ! He took me to an Italian restaurant and we had an amazing conversation . I told him about how many kids I want , and how my parents will be so excited to meet him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You said all that on the first date ? Alright ... Well are you two going out again ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah ! I called him after I got home to arrange our next date , but unfortunately his grandma is sick so he has been busy every night visiting her in the hospital .
segments.speaker: S2
